name: Extreme Car Driving Mania
description:
Racing on curvy dangerous track is of course, an impossible but with your best driving skills, you can prove that nothing is impossible in this world. In this much addictive game your core object is to drive car on the wonderful crazy zigzag tack by accelerating your car with your driving skills and boost up the speed of your fast car.

It allows you to select your choice mode; free ride mode and time trail mode. In free real ride mode you can drive your car stunt without any fear of time limits while in time trail mode you have to complete your task within the specified limit of time, so drive your car with strong grip on speed and also avoid to fall off from path. Start your car when green light blinks click on accelerate button to drive. Drive fast and far by collecting points to become the winner of this mania. It contains several challenging and thrilling missions. Clear missions with the strong controls and Unlock all of them.

How to Play:
- Tap up arrow button to increase speed.
- Tap down arrow button to reverse your car.
- Tap break button to stop or reduce the speed of car

Features of game:
- Smooth and simple control
- Variety of Amazing Sports car
- Amazingly Beautiful 3D Environments
- Dangerous Curvy and difficult tracks.
- Engine, Brake and Boost Updates
- Hours of Fun with Ultra Luxury Different Colorful Racing stunt Cars
